name: Maria Rodriguez
text: The best Mexican food in town! The al pastor tacos are incredible and the service is always friendly. This is our go-to spot for family dinners.

name: James Wilson
text: Authentic flavors and generous portions. The fajitas are sizzling hot and the guacamole is made fresh. Highly recommend!

name: Sarah Chen
text: Plaza Mexico has become our weekly tradition. The staff remembers our orders and the food is consistently delicious. Love the atmosphere!

name: Carlos Mendez
text: As someone from Mexico, I can say this food is the real deal. The flavors remind me of home. The carnitas are perfect!

name: Jennifer Taylor
text: Fast service and amazing food. Perfect for lunch breaks. The Tuesday taco special is unbeatable!
